title: 1505-G
statement: G. Encoded messagetime limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputInputThe first line of the input contains a single integer $$$N$$$ ($$$1 \\le N \\le 24$$$). The next $$$N$$$ lines contain $$$5$$$ space-separated integers each. The first three integers will be between 0 and 2, inclusive. The last two integers will be between 0 and 3, inclusive. The sum of the first three integers will be equal to the sum of the last two integers.OutputOutput the result â€“ a string of lowercase English letters.ExamplesInput1 1 0 0 1 0OutputaInput10 2 0 0 1 1 1 1 1 2 1 2 1 0 1 2 1 1 0 1 1 2 1 0 2 1 1 1 1 2 1 1 2 1 3 1 2 0 0 1 1 1 1 0 1 1 1 1 2 2 2Outputcodeforcez

processed.result:
You are given a number $N$. Then you have $N$ lines, each containing 5 integers. The first three integers in each line are between 0 and 2, inclusive. The last two integers are between 0 and 3, inclusive. The sum of the first three integers is always equal to the sum of the last two integers.

Your task is to output a string of lowercase English letters based on these numbers.

You are given a list of numbers.  Each line has 5 numbers. The first three numbers must add up to the same total as the last two numbers.  Your task is to produce a string of lowercase letters based on these numbers.
